snippet: As the Super Bowl ends and the off-season begins, hazing — and where the line should be drawn — will once again be part of the conversation about professional football.
lead_paragraph: As the Super Bowl ends and the off-season begins, hazing — and where the line should be drawn — will once again be part of the conversation about professional football.

headline.main: N.F.L. Off-Season Could Bring Changes on Rules of Hazing
headline.print_headline: Off-Season Could Bring Changes on Rules of Hazing
